projects.description: A silly idea; an interactive Tamagotchi powered by OpenAI.
projects.title: [Coming Soon]

projects.description: A completionist tracker for my character in Final Fantasy XIV.
projects.title: XIV Completionist Tracker

projects.description: (2018) A web app where you could navigate by country and get the top trending tweets happening in the area. Utilized Simple Maps and Twitter API. Created in React.
projects.title: Trending Twitter By Country

projects.description: (2018) Another small web application that listed video games like a library and displayed upcoming progamer tournaments for the game the user had selected. Utilized Giant Bomb and PandaScore API. Created in AngularJS.
projects.title: Pro Gamer

projects.description: (2020) A calculator app to determine damage given and received based on own stats, own skills used, and buffs from fellow party members that were active during a fight. It made trying to figure out the numbers on the spot a lot quicker!
projects.title: Shale D&D Calculator
